email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $51.25 works for us. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October and the cargo size at 140,000 metric tons? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.25 works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October, and the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Thanks for your prompt responses! Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for sending the draft charter party. We’ve reviewed it, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the final agreement. Please confirm the final freight rate of $51.25 per metric ton and the laycan dates. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed—final freight rate is $51.25 per metric ton, and laycan is 15-20 October. I’ll proceed with the final charter party and send it over for signature. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
